title: StanLogic: A Python Package for Boolean Simplification and Logic Computation
description: StanLogic is a Python package dedicated to Boolean expression simplification and logical reasoning. It provides computational tools that bridge mathematical formalism and algorithmic implementation for digital logic, electronics, and computer science education. The package includes KMapSolver for deriving minimal SOP and POS expressions for 2-4 variable Karnaugh Maps with support for don't-care conditions and efficient bitmask operations.
notes: This project is part of a broader initiative by Stan's Technologies to develop computational educational tools in logic and mathematics. The software serves as both a pedagogical and research tool for students, educators, and developers working with Boolean logic and digital electronics.
